channel.title: Went from acc to acc and they got banned but not my main
channel.description:
ok so say theres 3 accounts
j is my main
k is my mule
p is my other mule
g is my logs/ess trading account
f is my autoing accounts
j traded to k then k traded to p then to 13 f accounts to give rune axes.. k and p get banned then only 1 autoing account get banned.. but not my main.. why didnt my main get banned...?? g also gets banned when i trade ess to it
also.. i have 1m that i need to transfer to my main but im too afraid that they are watching me... what do i do? =(
i must be lucky..
